channel.title: PenguinScape Pkz V8**Development**Hiring**
channel.description:
Well,Hello Moparscapers and Welcome to My "Penguinscape Pkz V8" Thread.I am looking to get back into coding(With A new account,Since I didn't get "Rs w00dcut" back from the hack).
-I mainly Need A client coder and People to Run/Moderate The Forums -Obviously The Server Base will be from one of my Previous PenguinScape Versions;If I can find one. -If anyone has one of my server bases please give me the link;All of mine got deleted. -Below are applications if you would like to Apply.
[center][b]Applications:[/b][/center]
[b]Client Maker Application:[/b] [code]I want to be a Client Maker Because- I will listen to rs w00dcut and Try my hardest- I will use the best of my abilities- I Have some knowledge with Making Clients- Proof-[/code]
[b]Forum Maker:[/b] [code]I want to be a Forum Designer Because- I will be active on the forums and Advertise as much as possible- I will Not hack the forums at any point in time- Proof of Forums Experience-[/code]
[b]Server Testers:[/b] [code]Why should we chose you to Beta Test My Server- Will you give your EXACT opinions about questions I ask you- What day is most convienent for you to Beta Test- Do you have Hamachi(For Testing)-[/code]
[center][b]Forum Designer(s): - -[/b][/center]
[center][b]Client Maker(s): - -[/b][/center]
[center][b]Beta Testers: skiller noob1 - - - -[/b][/center]
Any questions or concerns,Contact me.
My msn- Rsw00dcut_brad@msn.com I'm not on Right now tho.

I want to be a Client Maker Because- im very good at coding
I will listen to rs w00dcut and Try my hardest- yes i will
I will use the best of my abilities- yup
I Have some knowledge with Making Clients- yes
Proof- … ull see if u accept

I want to be a Forum Designer Because- im good with forums
I will be active on the forums and Advertise as much as possible- yees
I will Not hack the forums at any point in time- yes

item.title: PenguinScape Pkz V8**Development**Hiring**
item.dc:creator: @playscape23232 playscape23232
item.description:
@playscape23232 wrote:

Why should we chose you to Beta Test My Server-Because i have been beta testers for other testers when itzkyle(lusfr) had his server
Will you give your EXACT opinions about questions I ask you- Yes
What day is most convienent for you to Beta Test- All Weekdays, contact me on msn
Do you have Hamachi(For Testing)- YES – PkPkScape3…Pass 123, Im “STATUS=Online”(cause of my server)… Thanks

I want to be a Client Maker Because- I love Clients and i loved ur servers.
I will listen to rs w00dcut and Try my hardest- I would
I will use the best of my abilities- Yes
I Have some knowledge with Making Clients- Yes, I know how to add new items, im not familar to cache, i know how to add all partyhats (texure and non)
Proof- uhh… I can give you a link of ricscape client with same partyhats items and looks the same but great textures! Pm me for link,

I also Think i have ur client/ server…
I have your client!!! Woot! Pm me for link
I had a copy of ur server… but not anymore…
Msn… PM me i dont want strangers

item.title: PenguinScape Pkz V8**Development**Hiring**
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Why should we chose you to Beta Test My Server- Because, I enjoy testing many things as I do in real life. And i’m not afraid to learn from my error.
Will you give your EXACT opinions about questions I ask you- Yes, I will not hold my answers back.
What day is most convienent for you to Beta Test- All week, but on Satuday from 9 A.M. to 12 P.M.
Do you have Hamachi(For Testing)- Yes.
Also, I’m a good forums maker. I’m also good with SMF. I’ll do both jobs if you like. And I will not hack your forums. I mean what idiot would hack forums?

Read full topic
